name: Attack it! Devil legion
summary: In the 60th Anniversary of the treaty of peace between Human and Mazoku, the new Mao received a great mission to MAKE MAZOKU GREAT AGAIN. However, time has changed, power is no longer the key to conquer the world, waves of challenges await...
